nodes.text: A sleeping bag was a form of portable bedding used in situations where a person was sleeping outdoors. Luke Skywalker used a sleeping bag when he visited the Temple of Eedit on Devaron.
While at the Black Spire Outpost on Batuu, a Trandoshan vendor named Kasif tried to sell Vi Moradi the latest innovation in sleeping bags- one that was self-cooling, self-warming and self-inflating.
